title: 07/05/21 DPS Hour 2 Rob Parker
itunes:title: 07/05/21 DPS Hour 2 Rob Parker
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Ryan Hollins, in for Dan, react to a major story in sports media and give insight on why it puts a major sports personality in hot water. The guys look at this year's NBA Finals and assess what a title would mean for either the Bucks or the Suns. Rob Parker of The Odd Couple joins the guys to talk Giannis Antetokounmpo, the legitimacy of this year's title, Chris Paul, and Shohei Ohtani.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
